about_the_game: Step into the world of "How to Train Your Car", where racing meets strategy, mentorship, and evolution. In this innovative simulation, your goal isn't just to be the fastest; it's to mold, nurture, and fine-tune your car's performance. Every training session counts, every decision affects your car's growth, and every race tests the bond you've formed. Will you emerge as the top trainer, guiding your car to championship glory?

content_descriptors.notes:
Agame is a game centered around combat scenarios where two teams, terrorists and counter-terrorists, engage in shooting battles. The game involves the use of various firearms, explosives, and tactical equipment. While there is violence in the form of shooting and explosions, the game does not depict gore, dismemberment, or explicit brutality. It's important to note that the game has a mature rating due to the violent nature of the gameplay.

Agame's primary focus is on competitive gameplay and multiplayer action, and it doesn't heavily feature storylines or narrative elements. Therefore, topics such as drug and alcohol abuse or self-harm are generally not present within the game's content.

detailed_description: Step into the world of "How to Train Your Car", where racing meets strategy, mentorship, and evolution. In this innovative simulation, your goal isn't just to be the fastest; it's to mold, nurture, and fine-tune your car's performance. Every training session counts, every decision affects your car's growth, and every race tests the bond you've formed. Will you emerge as the top trainer, guiding your car to championship glory?
name: How To Train Your Car

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: All version
  • Processor: AMD64 and Intel 64
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: All
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: All
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: All version
  • Processor: AMD64 and Intel 64
  • Memory: 32 MB RAM
  • Graphics: All
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: All

short_description: Dive into "How to Train Your Car". It's not just about speed, but mentoring your car to peak performance. Every choice shapes its growth; every race tests your bond. Can you guide your car to ultimate victory?
